ygData.subject: Re: Location of pages for research
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats a quest item, not research. Ask around in Freeport to those who might be interested in strange magic and you might find someone looking for that item.
ygData.messageBody:
Thats a quest item, not research.

Ask around in Freeport to those who might be interested in strange magic
and you might find someone looking for that item.

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 3:02 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Location of pages for research


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

It would be helpful if anyone finding pages would post the
type of creature they found it on so that maybe we can
turn up some new spells.

For my part, I have found an 'Illegible cantrip' on an orc
apprentice. Not sure what class' research item that is,
but I'm pretty sure it isn't ours...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Miller, Keith A. [SMTP:keithm@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 3:02 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Location of pages for research
>
> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> According to Verant, they are scattered on mid to high level monsters,
> with a greater chance of finding them on "magical" monsters.
>
> I have found research items on the following....
>
> 1. Goblin Warriors in BB (Necro Item)
> 2. Something in Unrest (Enchanter page)
>
> So, finding them on a rat is unlikely, but as far as standard loot
> carrying humanoids or undead, it seems any can carry items.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 2:54 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Location of pages for research
>
>
> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
> So what you're saying is I have just as high a probability of
> finding one on a large rat as I do a gnoll shaman?
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Rob Berryhill [SMTP:racefan@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 2:12 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Location of pages for research
> >
> > From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
> >
> > It is totally, 100% random. They have done this on purpose so that
> people
> > won't camp specific creatures.
> >
> > Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
> > Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> > http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
> > > Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 9:38 AM
> > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [eqenchanters] Location of pages for research
> > >
> > >
> > > From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
> > >
> > > I posted a message yesterday, but have yet to see a response.
> > > Does anyone know what creatures we need to be fighting to
> > > find the pages for our research? Someone posted which pages
> > > combine to make what spell, but didn't mention how to get them.
> > >
> > > I am sure we are all eagerly awaiting this info...
> > >
> > >
>
